title: New Client Resolution
body: I'm not sure if its just me but my new client's resolution is way too high for me and I can't change it. When I click and drag the client in any the direction a portion of the right side of the client will disappear completely, for example I cant see my entire friends list and makes it hard to tell which of my friends are online.

replies.body: I have the same problem. The login is on the right side and part is cut off. Here is a screenshot https://www.dropbox.com/s/98fjbqgt02m7y7q/Screenshot%202016-11-16%2014.29.54.png?dl=0 If I try to move the client the right side disappears completely and I'm left with only the animation
What's the resolution of your screen, and what happens if you change it?  You might be able to workaround this by using Ctrl+Down Arrow, but it can only go down so far.  Hope that helps!
Thanks for the tip I was able to bring down the size of the client and it's normal size now.
Thank you it worked for me
I have the exact same problem, this is really annoying
